alert.note: Alert for Kiowa; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 5:10PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Washita and northeastern Kiowa Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 510 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of Mountain View, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain View and Gotebo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
